::: {.cell}

:::

::: {.cell}

:::


The current valid map is identified by **Map code and version**: T7.2.web.map v1.0.


> The presence of sown pastures was approximated by selecting areas of overlap between existing irrigation infrastructure (Siebert et al. 2005; 2013) and presence of major livestock (Gilbert et al. 2018)..

::: {.cell}

:::


You can download and use this file from the following sources:

- Zenodo repository (bundle of maps) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG versions in compressed file](http://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5090419))
 - Mapbox tileset ([GeoTIFF version uploaded to Mapbox](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_2_web_map))
 - Zenodo repository (EFG map) ([Includes GeoTIFF, GeoJSON and PNG files](https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.5091081))

::: {.cell}

:::

This section provides information about the valid indicative distribution map for the ecosystem functional group [**T7.2 Sown pastures and fields**](/efg-info/T7_2.qmd).


::: {.cell}

:::

## Available maps

These maps are considered current and valid indicative distribution maps for this ecosystem functional group.

- Indicative Map (**code: T7.2.WM.nwx**, version v1.0) 

## Map files

You can download geospatial data for this map from the following sources:

T7.2.WM.nwx (v1.0){target="gisdata"}: [Mapbox tileset](https://studio.mapbox.com/tilesets/jrfep.T7_2_WM_nwx)

Note that you need to login to some services like [mapbox](https://www.mapbox.com){target="links"} or [earthengine](https://earthengine.google.com){target="links"}, and in some cases you also need to request access to the files.
